content: क्ष्वेड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Crooked, curved. {@--2@} Wicked, depraved {@--3@} Difficult to be approached. --डः {@--1@} Sound, noise. {@--2@} Venom, poison; गुणदोषौ बुधो गृह्णन्निंदुक्ष्वेडाविवेश्वरः . शिरसा श्लाघते पूर्वं परं कंठेनियच्छति <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--3@} Moistening. {@--4@} Abandonment. {@--5@} An inarticulate sound. --डा {@--1@} The roaring of a lion. {@--2@} A war-cry, war-whoop. {@--3@} A bamboo.
